Professional Aptitude Council

Front-End Developer - job market startup

One of five developers building a career advancement and hiring destination. XHTML, CSS, AJAX, Rails, Git.

  • Wide range of responsibilities, including overseeing site creation, wireframing, hand-coding front-end, and maintaining site post-launch.
  • Start-up culture: Worked long - often sleepless - nights to meet deadlines.
  • Defined most of the front-end coding standards to increase both flexibility and cleanliness of code.
  • Worked closely with design team on ideation and review of designs for both marketing campaigns and site builds.
